ComicInfo.Title: Ghosts of Doom; The Phantom Freaks; Custodian of the Dead; Rehearsal for Death
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ghosts of Doom: Zombies and a giant crocodile populate the eerie Everglades. Gangsters arrive from Miami with a kidnap victim, looking for a hideout. Soon the parties battle each other.
The Phantom Freaks: Emil Lorenz runs a carnival freak show and mistreats his animal-like creatures. When he burns them in a fire to collect insurance money and open up an amusement park, Lorenz is being haunted by his victims.
Custodian of the Dead: Undertaker Horace Vennery is a graverobber at night, stealing valuable possessions off his dead clients. Crawling through coffins, he is caught in a cave-in and eaten by rats.
Rehearsal for Death: Understudy Fenton demands his chance on stage and murders leading man Worthington. However, Worthington’s ghost returns for a night-long rehearsal of Hamlet’s death scene. Fenton dies of exhaustion.
